thread.title: JP Duminy out of ODIs after sustaining hand injury
thread.title_full: JP Duminy out of ODIs after sustaining hand injury - Sports

author: PTI
title: JP Duminy out of ODIs after sustaining hand injury
text:
New Delhi: The South African team management suffered a blow today after senior batsman JP Duminy was ruled out of the remaining two ODI matches against India.


JP Duminy 
According to a tweet from official handle of Cricket South Africa, "Duminy sustained a laceration to his right hand during the third ODI. Will need 2-3 weeks to recover. #IndvSA" Dean Elgar called up to replace Duminy in ODI squad.
South Africa are slated to play the next ODI in Chennai on October 22.
